title: Hilarious font satire from SomthingAwful.com
content:
I was browsing through my bookmarks tagged with _font_ tonight and stumbled upon my only link tagged with both _font & humor_. Enjoy!

[http://www.somethingawful.com/fakesa/fontsite/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122716/http:/www.somethingawful.com/fakesa/fontsite/ "http://www.somethingawful.com/fakesa/fontsite/")

 [‹ What printer?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122716/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46308 "Go to previous forum topic") [Happy Happy Paul! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122716/http:/www.typophile.com/node/46094 "Go to next forum topic")
author: davidc

comments.content:
I’m glad they reposted it - it was only available via webarchive for a while.

[http://typophile.com/node/30804](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122716/http:/typophile.com/node/30804 "http://typophile.com/node/30804")

Damn, and I did a search for “2002 honest fonts”. Next time I’ll use google site search instead.

[http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=%222002%20honest%20fonts%22%20site%...](http://web.archive.org/web/20080905122716/http:/www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=%222002%20honest%20fonts%22%20site%3Atypophile.com "http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=%222002%20honest%20fonts%22%20site%3Atypophile.com")
Oh thank God, we can start giving the link to people who ask for free fonts again!
These will definitely come in handy for the next paper I have to write.
Do you have stairs in your house?
Those fake ads are a blast.
